sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import { TagCloud } from 'react-tagcloud' const data = [ { value: 'Bootstrap', count: 25 }, { value: 'Sass', count: 26 }, { value: 'JavaScript', count: 38 }, { value: 'React', count: 30 }, { value: 'Nodejs', count: 28 }, { value: 'WordPress', count: 25 }, { value: 'HTML5', count: 33 }, { value: 'CSS3', count: 27 }, { value: 'TypeScript', count: 23 }, { value: 'NPM', count: 29 }, { value: 'REST', count: 28 }, { value: 'SVG animations', count: 27 }, ] const customRenderer = (tag, size, color) => ( {tag.value} ) export default () => ( )
